Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
20.
1107Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā…  (sahajātasadisaṃ) naanantarapaccayā…  nasamanantarapaccayā…  naaññamaññapaccayā…  naupanissayapaccayā.
<< Naārammaṇaup Napurejāta >>
